attributes.action: Award Captain Tom Moore a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Not only is Captain Tom Moore a war hero, he is a modern day hero. At 99 years old he has walked round his garden and raised over £6 million (at time of writing) and deserves to be knighted on his 100th birthday
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore deserves a knighthood for his 100th birthday for his outstanding fundraising for the NHS during the Covid-19 crisis

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
